title: A Wolf Howls: Memories of a Poet

history.message:
Hi Sylvia,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Sylvia,

I've sent you an email (to the address registered at Submittable). Please let me know if you received it.

Thank you,

D.

Dear Sylvia Robinson,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review
No email response sent to submitter.
